snippet: Battle-hardened fighters and others said Sheik Khatib’s offer to open a dialogue with the government would only embolden President Bashar al-Assad to intensify the civil war.
abstract: Syrian opposition leader Sheik Ahmad Moaz al-Khatib's offer to open dialogue with Pres Bashar al-Assad causes uproar among opposition fighters, who contend offer will only embolden Assad to intensify civil war.
lead_paragraph: Battle-hardened fighters and others said Sheik Khatib’s offer to open a dialogue with the government would only embolden President Bashar al-Assad to intensify the civil war.

headline.main: Critics Assail Syrian Opposition Leader’s Offer on Talks
headline.print_headline: Syria: Critics Assail Opposition Leader’s Offer on Talks

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
